Package com.github.macgregor.alexandria

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BatchProcess.AfterBatch<T>
    Lambda compatible interface that will be called after processing is complete
    BatchProcess.Batch<T>
    Lambda compatible interface that will collect objects to be processed
    BatchProcess.Task<T>
    Lambda compatible interface that will process each object returned by BatchProcess.Batch.collect(Context).
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Alexandria
    Core class for saving, loading and processing documents.
    AlexandriaConvert
    Converts indexed documents from markdown to html.
    AlexandriaIndex
    Process files into metadata for tracking.
    AlexandriaSync
    Sync indexed documents with the configured remote.
    BatchProcess<T>
    Generic class to handle wrapping batch processing in robust error handling.
    Config
    Alexandria configuration that should be persisted between runs.
    Config.DocumentMetadata
    Metadata used to index a document for tracking and syncing purposes.
    Config.RemoteConfig
    Configuration properties for instantiating and configuring a Remote.
    Context
    Runtime context containing arguments passed from the user agent (e.g.
    Jackson
    Static configuration of the Jackson parser Used by Remote implementations for parsing json requests and responses as well as the saving/loading of the Alexandria Context.
    Jackson.PathDeserializer
    Converts a string into a Path, which Jackson wasnt always handling gracefully.
    Jackson.PathSerializer
    Converts a Path into a string, which Jackson wasnt always handling gracefully.
    Jackson.ZonedDateTimeDeserializer
    Converts a string to a ZonedDateTime instance using a provided DateTimeFormatter
    Jackson.ZonedDateTimeSerializer
    Converts a ZonedDateTime instance to a string using the provided DateTimeFormatter
    Markdown
    Configure Flexmark markdown library
    Resources
    Utility class for working with file system resources.
    Resources.PathFinder
    Find files along a set of directories that based on include/exclude patterns.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Config.DocumentMetadata.State
    Simple enum to provide type checked states for document processing.
